name: enb-e2e
description: Parallel Cypress tests for ENB booking and payment flow

scripts.test:parallel: npx concurrently "npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --spec cypress/e2e/Test_Eonline_one_off.cy.js" "npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --spec cypress/e2e/Test_Eonline_one_off2.cy.js"
scripts.test:matrix: echo 'Use GitHub Actions matrix to parallelize'

author: Yerandy Espinosa
